metadata.description: Sela. Robyn Hood. Red Riding Hood. Captain Hook. Neptune, god of the sea. Van Helsing. On their own, they are some of the most powerful beings in the Grimm Universe... but together, they are the REALM KNIGHTS. Brought together to stop an ancient evil from regaining his all-powerful weapons, can these conflicted warriors work out their own issues in time to save the world?
metadata.name: Realm Knights
